value:
Prince Alfonse and Princess
Sharena seem to be quite close.
That brings back memories...

It was my duty for many years to
protect Queen Ishtar of my world.
I took my duty very seriously.

Please take care of yourself. This
group would be doomed if it lost
your keen sense of tactics.

My sister, Olwen, more than grew up
when I wasn't looking—she became
formidable in her own right.

There was a tactician so brilliant in
my world that he was thought of as
a god that presided over war.$k$pI must say, your command is
perhaps as impeccable.

Excuse my sudden appearance.
My name is Reinhardt. I bring
greetings as a sign of friendship.

Better than expected. I should
always focus this much.

At this rate, I may achieve
what I must.

Such a failing. Am I losing my
conviction?

This is an honor. In thanks, I pledge
to prevail in battle.

I am Reinhardt of Friege. Allow
me to unleash havoc on your
enemies with my thunder magic.

When I was young, my young sister,
Olwen, followed me everywhere.$k$pAs her elder brother, I felt it my
duty to guide her path in life,
helping her at every turn.$k$pBut I now realize I wasn't doing it
just for Olwen, nor was I even
leading as much as I thought.$k$pIt was more like she and I each
had our own path, though
equally high standards.$k$pYou have helped me understand
that at last. You and I—different,
yet fully committed.$k$pWhat an ideal way to grow—neither
leading nor following, but walking
together. I thank you.
はっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
You're strong...
This must be fate.
I'll give it my all.
You will back down.
Magic is everything!
Undone...
Ha
Tell me. What are your orders?
Come now! No more of that.
You have quite a skill for battle tactics.
I knew a brilliant tactician named Saias. You may be his superior.
I have a younger sister named Olwen. Do you have any siblings?
My sister went her way. I went mine.
I will remain with you—no matter the circumstances.
Understood.
Orders?
Let's go.
